Summary: 6 boys playing basketball at school playground, first noticed sphere that looked like the moon or venus, except it was greenish in color. We con
divs: sighting detailsnoticed what looked like the moon\venus except it had a greenish tint to it. we continued to play basketball and several minutes later, we looked up and noticed that the object was larger. we laughed but continued playing ball. the next time we looked up, it was a giant fireball, appearing to be right above us. i ran, climbed a tall fence, ran through a garden and up onto the porch of a house. when i looked up, it was gone. all 6 boys saw the same thing. i saw one of the boys ~20 years later and he immediately asked me if i remembered that event.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around January 15th 1965
